value.name: Man says he's AWOL, runs from police
value.description: A man who said he was AWOL from the military was arrested b Madisonville Police May 14. Madisonville Police Detective David Wear said said around 2:34 p.m. officers were notified of a man who had vandalized several cars in a parking lot on Main Street,

value.name: Shots fired in argument about baby
value.description: An argument over a month old child led to shots being fired at a Sweetwater residence on May 10. Sweetwater Police Sgt. John Brewster said he was sent to McCaslin Avenue and found Terry Griffin, who had been reported as the shooter.
